title: So fun playing against Ornn
body: Seeing Ornn just casually tank 4 enemy team mates in a 1v4 for 20 seconds and still getting away with half health is beyond fun and balanced. Not to mention he also does half your hp in one combo! So fun!!!!

replies.body: Imagine playing Jayce and saying it isn't fun playing against certain champions, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GNZmPBaz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-14T04:56:34.292+0000)
>
> Imagine playing Jayce and saying it isn't fun playing against certain champions, lol.

Imagine jayce having a 43% overall winrate being rated the 3rd worst champ in league and caring about laning against a free elo laner

> [{quoted}](name=JayceAccount43,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GNZmPBaz,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-01-14T10:31:43.278+0000)
>
> Imagine jayce having a 43% overall winrate being rated the 3rd worst champ in league and caring about laning against a free elo laner

43%? Where are you getting your numbers, I'm getting 45% at top and 51% mid, at least at your elo.

https://u.gg/lol/champions/jayce/build?rank=platinum

https://u.gg/lol/champions/jayce/build?rank=platinum&role=middle
Spell pen helps for hurting tanks. Otherwise, you're suppose to attack everyone EXCEPT the one person that can stand for 5 seconds and not die.
God forbid a tank be TANKY
Especially a tank that hasn't received a skin other than his release one since his release.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GNZmPBaz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-14T05:04:05.461+0000)
>
> Especially a tank that hasn't received a skin other than his release one since his release.

Salt in my wounds. I'm still pissed that they had Elderwood concept art that was incredibly detailed and chose not to make it. Knowing Riot they straight up cancelled it lol
And they say there’s too much damage in this game.

> [{quoted}](name=The entire team,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GNZmPBaz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-01-14T04:37:54.972+0000)
>
> And they say there’s too much damage in this game.

Yes.
Ornn is the only tank in the game hard winning lane because he has such a ridiculous amount of %hp damage.
Further he is the only champ that can give tank items the actual stats they need to make tanks genuinely tanky.
